data.eml:eml: A new species of Limnephilidae (Insecta: Trichoptera) from the Western Alps (Insecta: Trichoptera)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Graf, Wolfram, Vitecek, Simon (2016): A new species of Limnephilidae (Insecta: Trichoptera) from the Western Alps (Insecta: Trichoptera). Zootaxa 4085 (3): 431-437, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4085.3.6
